text: Méziane Idjerouidène (born 13 June 1980 in Paris) is the current managing director of his father's French airline, Aigle Azur, since 2008. Idjerouidène became familiar with airlines while he was young as he spent his holidays doing part-time jobs in the family business before graduating from Toulouse Business School and the French Civil Aviation University (Mastère Spécialisé 2003).Annuaire Méziane Idjeroudène is also board member at ENAC Alumni.Conseil d'administration == References == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the École nationale de l'aviation civile Category:Aviation in France Category:Businesspeople from Paris
title: Méziane Idjerouidène
